function NPC_508000:Init( NPCID ) NPC_508000.BufIdBubble = 40900 end
function NPC_508000:OnSpawn( Info ) this:Aggro("near",0) end
function NPC_508000:OnCombatBegin() this:GainBuff( NPC_508000.BufIdBubble ) this:SetTimer( 1, 20, false ) end
function NPC_508000:OnTimer( Index ) if Index == 1 then this:RemoveBuff( NPC_508000.BufIdBubble ) this:Despawn(false) return end end
function NPC_508000:OnFinishKillAttack( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Despawn(false) end
